ABOUT-PAGE.FIRST-HALF-FELIPE: Felipe Costa da Silva, 23 years old. Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil.
ABOUT-PAGE.FIRST-HALF-PARAGRAPH: I'm studying Science and Technology at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte, with an emphasis on Applied Computing, since 2023 I've been studying front end technologies. In my free time I like to play some video games and work on my personal projects.

PROJECTS-PAGE.Explore our premium collection of authen: Explore our premium collection of authentic katanas. Find the perfect sword for collectors, martial artists, and enthusiasts. High-quality craftsmanship and detailed designs for every budget.
PROJECTS-PAGE.Manage your tasks simply and efficiently: Manage your tasks simply and efficiently with our to-do list app. Easily add, edit, filter and complete tasks.
PROJECTS-PAGE.Order your snack themed with the HORROR: Order your snack themed with the HORROR of Halloween! Take advantage of the promotions and don't forget to sign up to receive offers from Caldeirão da Bruxa.
PROJECTS-PAGE.Space Hero is a game made for a final pr: Space Hero is a game made for a final project for a college subject, this is a remake of it, but still in the development process.
